title: kuzhalOsai kETkudamma
sahitya:
kuzhalOshai kETkudammA ammA (ammamma) gOpAlakrSNan


anupallavi

  mazhaliyum kiLLaiyum manda mArutam pOl mAdhavan gOkula mAyavan UdiDum


caraNam    jnAla uyirgaL ellAm nAdak-kanavinilE naTTa cittiram pOlE aTTadikkum irukka 
kAla vEgamum rAsa lIlaiyai pArttu nirkka kAdalar ellAm inba nAda surattil sokka
